CAMEO.DESCRIBE:
Register for free.
Without obligation.
Easy and secure communication. Mobile and desktop
Connect with all your contacts.
Explore our smart features.
Register today!

INFO.TERMS: You need to accept the terms of use.

USERNAME.EXISTS: Username already exists! Please choose another.
USERNAME.INVALID: Invalid username. Avoid spaces and special characters.

START.TITLE: Welcome to cameoNet!
START.TEXT:
cameoNet is an open source messenger that provides end-to-end encryption for safe, private and commercial Communication!
Attention: this is a first beta version!
The app may contain errors, the user interface is still under development and many new features will be added in the next versions. We cannot guarantee the safety of your data. Please copy all your important data.
Please help us to improve cameoNet. We are happy about every error or improvement you post on http://support.cameonet.de
the cameoNet-Team.

SKIP.TEXT: Don't show me this page again

LABEL.KEY_GENERATION: Here you can generate a cameoKey for this identity for better security.
LABEL.SHOW_PW_INFO_BECAUSE_USER_HAS_NO_LOCAL_K: A password is required because there is no cameoKey on this device

WARN.RECIPIENTS_MISSING_OKAY: I do not want any other recipients than myself.
WARN.NO_PASSWORD:
Password required but not configured.
Configure your encryption settings here
WARN.FILESIZE_REACHED: The maximum file size of {{maxFileSize | cmBytesHumanReadable}} has been exceeded. Your file '{{fileName}}' is {{fileSize | cmBytesHumanReadable}} big.

PLACEHOLDER.ADD_NEW_CONTACT: Enter a cameoID or display name
PLACEHOLDER.REQUEST_MESSAGE: Add a message to the friend request

UPDATE.ERROR: Something went wrong, please try again

KEYS.NO_LOCALKEYS_ON_THIS_DEVICE: There is no cameoKey on this device for your identity. Here you can generate or import a cameoKey for better security.
KEYS.UNTRUSTED_PUBLICKEYS_EXISTS:
You have cameoKeys for this identity on several devides that are not authenticated. You cannot read messages written and encrypted on devices with not authenticated cameoKeys.
To authenticate a cameoKey click on next to the cameoKey in the list below.
KEYS.EXPORT_KEY_DESCRIPTION: Export your private cameoKey. Please make sure to keep it save. You can use to recover your encrypted data.
KEYS.STOREKEY_DESCRIPTION:
The cameoKey consists of a public and a private part. The private will be stored only on this device. It is important to keep it secret since it can decrypt all your data.
The private key can be exported for data recovery if the device is lost.

HANDSHAKE.HANDSHAKE_NOW:
Do you want to authenticate this device against '{{device}}' now, to be able to read all talks written and encrypted on these devices by each other?
Please start the device '{{device}}' with the same identity '{{identity}}'.
HANDSHAKE.CHOOSE_OLD_DEVICE: Please select a device with which you want to perform the authentication!
HANDSHAKE.TRANSACTION_SECRET: To authenticate this device please enter the following code in the input field on your other device:
HANDSHAKE.HANDSHAKE_RECEIVED: Would you like to start the authentication?
HANDSHAKE.HANDSHAKE_NEED_TRANSACTID: To authenticate your new device please enter the code below:

ERROR.EMPTY: Please add a Password and confirm it

INFO.INVALID_PHONE_NUMBER: The entered value does not seem to be a phone number.
INFO.EMPTY: The phone number field is empty

INFO.DISPLAYNAME_EXISTS: The display name already exists in your constact book.

EMPTY.NAME: Name is empty.
EMPTY.PHONE_OR_EMAIL: Please enter a phone number or a email address.

BULK_REKEYING.CONTENT: The talks on this device are being encrypted for the new cameoKey.

KEY_REQUEST.CONTENT:
There is a new cameoKey on this device which needs to be authenticated by another device. This is necessary to read all existing talks. Do you want to authenticate this cameoKey now?
Please start another device with the same identity '{{identity}}'.

KEY_RESPONSE.CONTENT:
An other device which pretends to be yours asked to be authenticated by this device. After that your new device gets access to all of your encrypted talks.
Do you want to authenticate the following device?

SAVE_AS.IOS_NOT_SUPPORT: Unfortunately iOS does not support downloading this file. Open this talk on a non-iOS device to download this file. Supported formats: .pdf

WEBREADER.NOTICE: Please register to use this feature.

JOB.IN_PROGRESS: You have edited this site without saving. Do you really want to leave this page?
JOB.FILES_IN_UPLOAD_PROGRESS: Files are being uploaded. Do you really want to leave this page?

KEY_TRANSMISSION_SYMMETRIC.NAME: Encryption relies on a password.
KEY_TRANSMISSION_SYMMETRIC.DESCRIPTION_NEW: Encryption with a password is not bad in itself, but the strength of the encryption greatly depends on the password you choose. You have to use a password because not all recipients have a proper key available to you.
KEY_TRANSMISSION_SYMMETRIC.DESCRIPTION: Encryption with a password is not bad in itself, but the strength of the encryption greatly depends on the password you choose. You have to use a password because not all recipients had a proper a key available when the conversation started.
KEY_TRANSMISSION_SYMMETRIC.DESCRIPTION_PRIVATE_KEY_MISSING: You do not have a cameoKey on this device.

NO_SYMMETRIC_KEY_TRANSMISSION.NAME: This talk is safely encrypted with cameoKeys.

HAS_PASSCAPTCHA.NAME: PassCaptcha enabled
HAS_PASSCAPTCHA.DESCRIPTION: Using the passCaptcha method makes it harder to automatically decrypt your messages on a large scale, but it is not actually save.

WELCOME.MESSAGE:
Hello, I am the cameoNet support. 

If you have any questions or problems do not hesitate to reply on this message. You can also use our help system at http://support.cameonet.de,

the cameoNet team.
WELCOME.SUBJECT: Welcome to cameoNet!

ERROR.WRONG_INPUT: Please check the code and try again!
